name: Because We Hate You And Want You To Know It
description: Undefeated @ Chicago Regionals. 9th place overall finish.

name: Lady and the Tramp
description: Homeless runner and his dogs.

name: Eff This
description: I wish I was Andy.

name: _CodegatesCodegatesCodegates v.3
description: Play codegates. Make them stronger. Score Agendas. Win.

name: PORTALS! v3.2
description: Please please please don't play Gordian Blade.

name: Sex-bot Protection Initiative - Redesign
Hit & Run 2.0
description:
Draw up, dump with Freelance Coding Contract for cash return to play with Clone Chip what you need simple and effective. SMC allows you to go for what you need from your deck Medium, Keyhole, Nerve agent and Sneakdoor pile the pressure on central servers.

Leprechaun helps with both MU and freelance. Opus give you sustainable income for the rest of the game. Toolbox helps MU and link str and income since your bust econ is so high you can easily get this down turn 1 or 2.

name: Zombizzard
description:
Wave hi to the stupid deck.

Install your origamis on different djinns and go for savoir faire and eventually autoscripter.

Then stimhack - install through savoir-faire +1 click -> duggar. For exemple, you can fire and forget crypsis this way.

18 max stimhack, hand size goes up to 18 on max size.

If you don't win especially vs NEH, at least your opponents will laugh a little :)

name: Noise Milling
RP ClickTaxi
Criminal-Andromeda-plane2
description: Plain deck, maybe fast, just to try a little criminal; with mod and help by Simone 'Suka', then remodded with my flavour

name: Duggar's Click Storm V1
description:
This deck is all about Duggar's and Cache, and using Autoscripter and Joshua B. in order to run mass click turns. Aesop's Pawnshop should probably be a 3-of and I still need to do a lot of tinkering and testing.

Any feedback would be appreciated.

name: Elizabeth is a bitch
description: This is a testing for normal Blue sun deck. I try several cool Illicit ICE, such as Fenris,Grim. And Elizabeth is quite Amazing in this deck. I can use it to recover my BP for only 1 click at no cost and keep recurring!! Illicit ICE become super strong with the protect by Elizabeth. Fenris is worth trying. After the runner bumped into Fenris without protection or breakers, they suffered from the Brain Damage, and the run ended.You just simply pick up your Fenris,and put it some other where then the runner will become super cautious to run you before they got their sentry breakers.(Since 2 Brain Damages guarantee the instant kill of SEA SCORCHED) I am also considering -1 Tollbooth -1 Enigma +2 Eli 1.0 to improve the consistency.

name: Countdown To Extinction
description:
Start the clock. You have only few minutes to win this game. The runner knows it and will run like a freak. Let him.

The ices end the run, but Chum makes it worse. And Chum kills if combined with most ices on the deck.

You may score for the win or kill for the thrill. I believe this deck is a well balanced death threat.

name: BSBI
description: Blue Sun Big Ices

name: "Ian Stirling, Vampire Spook"
description:
Deck from this awesome video from hidden assets https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CWnQhhuQFOw

JUST SO MUCH FUN

Completed info since the deck in the video was with less than 45 cards. Enjoy.

name: HB Weenie ICE
description:
Get ICE out of deck as fast as possible to thin for economy and late game fast-advance with Biotic Labor. Set up a scoring remote for early agendas then blow it up later to ice-up R&D with Interns for fast advance mode!

Concentrate on protecting R&D as it gets a agenda dense. Wisp is good for setting the runner back an extra couple of turns after an expensive R&D run. Also, corporate troubleshooter can help get a couple of extra hits in with Architect.

I've been playing versions of this deck for a while and I have to say that Interns and Architect are key for parasite defense (the biggest threat to this deck by far!).

I've noticed that ICE gets split between R&D and Archives when playing against Noise-Shop.

Mutate is great for pulling out NEXT Silver when you only have Bronze or getting rid of a pesky Knight.

Currently I'm playing with the idea of putting in Chronos Project to combat Parasite recursion.

Lots of fun to play and waiting patiently for NEXT Gold.

name: Key shards
description:
Central pressure. Hades in case of suspicious Jacksons.

Ignore remotes (or just facecheck them with faerie). If absolutely necessary, attack them using tricks such as femme/fairy/emergency/inside jobs.

name: Prefontaine
description:
Run, run, run!

This deck is designed to fuel itself through running. Keep poking and getting accesses while trying to keep the corporation poor with AS, Vamp, and Emergency Shutdown. Feint often helps get tempo again after getting shut out with a virus purge.

Atman is in to speed up rig set-up and Inti for Wraparound and Ice Wall.

name: Virus Factory
description: I'm not sure if this works, but it seems like a fun idea. Mass install virus programs, recur mass installs with same old things. Don't run at all unless they cerebral static, and then crypsis/darwin to get into servers. Mill as much as possible into archives, then hades shard to access.

name: Virus Factory
description: I'm not sure if this works, but it seems like a fun idea. Mass install virus programs, recur mass installs with same old things. Don't run at all unless they cerebral static, and then crypsis/darwin to get into servers. Mill as much as possible into archives, then hades shard to access.

name: Unfun HB FA
(Through the) Looking Glass
Natty Nasir
Switchblade Sisters - Act 3
description:
Andromeda has hit the streets, and she's ready to live it up! Unless you're a friend or business associate, you need to stay the hell outta her way! Her weapon of choice has recently been a Switchblade, and don't be fooled by the red dress or charming good looks. She is not afraid to use it.

Andi has been around the block more than a few times, and has just the connections she needs to make everything she does as painless as possible. Her fellow PICs include the elusive Kati Jones and the ruthless Femme Fatales. Everything she does packs a punch...

But don't go and think that she can't Cloak her true intentions if need be!

Bad girls crave publicity - tell me what ya think of her!

Update - Added Mr. Li in to the fray to help with more consistency.

name: Cache Storm V1
description:
So the crazy thing about this deck is that it actually works as a pure solitaire deck. Get Djinn out and hunt your Cache cards ASAP. Then look for Origami, Duggar's and Rachel Beckman. If you get the breakers and can run, go ahead. If not, keep pestering and annoying the corp by milling and poking. Keep your hand full instead of running Plascrete Carapace.

Finally, when your milling is complete/enough, or when you think the corp is getting close to winning, use your Hades Shard for the ultimate frustration win. When it works, it's so awesome that you might even feel guilty. This will also get WAY better once Stim Dealer is released!

Have fun with it, and feel free to comment and make suggestions!

name: Drawn together v4
description: Mulligan for a card draw card. Inject acts like a 1C draw 4 most of the time. Other times a Diesel 4-6. Still working on the fast advance matchup but if they have to put something in a remote to score it you will have the money to get to it.
